name: relive appveyor build 1.0.4604
body:
## What's Changed
* Quick save keys recording support by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1550
* fix overflow in quicksave funcs by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1552
* fix #1531 by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1553
* fix potential fmv crash after completing scrabania and paramonia by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1556
* fix #1555 by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1557
* register `SwitchStateBooleanLogic` and `Elum` AO types by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1558
* fix nullptr bug in Stop_slig_sounds by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1559
* rename appveyor artifacts by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1560


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/compare/appveyor_1.0.4587...appveyor_1.0.4604

name: relive appveyor build 1.0.4587
body:
## What's Changed
* fix lvl header reading by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1467
* Update sdl2 to version 2.0.20 by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1470
* auto add missing lvl/cam resources by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1471
* build fix when used in qt-editor by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1472
* fix FindInSourceLvls not exhausting all source lvls by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1473
* Add resources to most objects in AE by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1474
* Add AO resources to lvl when exporting by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1475
* Add AE TimedMine object to the editor by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1476
* relive api - explicitly look for anim resources by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1477
* relive api - fix some resources crashing by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1478
* Fix wrong object property names & improvements by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1479
* fix json upgrader not working correctly by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1482
* relive api - rename upgrader classes to fix upgrade fails by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1483
* Changed the Enum::eGameSpeak5 and 8 by @Ravo92 in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1484
* fix json upgrader for real by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1485
* Fix bug #1342 - movie transition loop when riding elum by @Retoxified in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1486
* add some logging showing how the mystery of start controller direction by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1487
* wip ADD_LINKED for editor properties by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1490
* fix writing of Identity_string by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1491
* Ensure ids are always unique to fix #1223 by @Retoxified in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1489
* add missing collision types by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1493
* fix objects not taking damage from bg minecar by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1494
* fix #1495 by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1496
* Upgrade SDL2, improve controller logging by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1497
* fix controller vibration by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1498
* AO music controller de-sync fix attempt by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1499
* fix broken slog speedrun strat & use higher precision on vel tables by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1501
* Use log warning instead of `ALIVE_FATAL` in `vExitPortal` by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1503
* fix demo autoplay order being off by 1 by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1504
* fix #1500 & name some fields by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1505
* stop doing accidental value initialization in ao/ae_new by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1506
* fix falling item killing abe when it shouldn't by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1510
* add -flush option to recorder by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1513
* fix incorrect if statement in DealBlastDamage_459160 causing sligs to die by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1515
* Lift leak fix by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1517
* improve AO playback on de-syncs by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1518
* turn 0 init back on by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1519
* fix out of bounds read in sRunJumpBeginVelTable_4BC8A0 by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1521
* make SYS_GetTicks deterministic in music controller by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1522
* slog fix by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1524
* fix elum not eating honey after dying and returning to the honey spot by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1525
* fix slurg spawner not waiting for the spawn interval by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1527
* fix broken music in AE/AO by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1528
* fix #1529 by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1530
* fix disappearing lifts in AO by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1532
* fix AO & AE not clearing liftpoint tlv flags by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1533
* fix unconditional particle burst resource loading in AO by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1534
* fix uxb's in AO ticking too fast by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1535
* fix AO grenade explode timer being off by 1 frame by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1536
* fix broken RollingBall rect overlap check by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1537
* fix wrong motion detector laser & zball refcount by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1538
* Add elum bees struggling resource for the bees object by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1539
* break all recordings and cause hard merge conflicts by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1540
* Revert "break all recordings and cause hard merge conflicts" by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1541
* fix inverted RunToWalk/MidRunToWalk by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1543
* fix broken velx check in FallKnockBackOrSmash_4B4A90() by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1544
* fix broken PullLever_436450() behavior by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1545
* Add AE MovingBombStopper to editor by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1546
* fix flying slig speed run strat due to wrong calc in sub_436C60 by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1548

## New Contributors
* @Ravo92 made their first contribution in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1484
* @Retoxified made their first contribution in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1486

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/compare/appveyor_1.0.4426...appveyor_1.0.4587

name: relive appveyor build 1.0.4426
body:
## What's Changed
* AE bugfix: disable reverb in cutscenes (#1126) by @pryon in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1433
* wip json upgrader by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1438
* fix typo in `Slig_Knockback` by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1439
* fix incorrect resource files for abe falling and die by @mlgthatsme in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1441
* rename editor properties and fix some swapped/wrong AO AnimIds by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1442
* fix azure windows builds by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1445
* fix AO crashing when beating up muds by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1444
* fix more AnimId mudokon crashes by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1446
* auto testing improvements, expose grid snapping funcs to the API by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1447
* fix qt editor no longer building with latest relive api by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1448
* ALIVE_FATAL when no bird portal exit has been found by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1449
* add missing AO well bg anim id's by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1450
* fix custom messages in the 32bit engine build, fixes #1436 by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1451
* name the data for HintFly letters by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1452
* fix max switch id check being off by 1, add check to AO by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1453
* fix some wrong field names, rename switch to lever, make some editor property names more understandable by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1455
* better WheelSyncer enum names, make `CrawlingSlig` and `FlyingSlig` anim id name formatting more consistent by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1456
* API: Read back any custom LCD/hint fly messages by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1457
* json upgrader impl by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1458
* rename `ADD_UPGRADE_STEP` -> `ADD_UPGRADE_STEP_FROM`, fix hintfly messages reading back wrong messages by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1459
* abstract file i/o calls in the API by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1460
* Error handling improvements round 1 by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1461
* allow the API to override what ALIVE_FATAL does by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1462
* missing include by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1463


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/compare/appveyor_1.0.4360...appveyor_1.0.4426

name: relive appveyor build 1.0.4360
body:
## What's Changed
* Detect the FG1 format on reading by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1372
* fix stackoverflow from using huge stack buffers by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1373
* add missing header by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1374
* Document lots of AE TLV's for the qt editor  by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1375
* wip fg1 writer + crash hack fix by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1376
* refactor/prep for auto FG1 rewrite testing by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1377
* more AE documentation for the editor by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1378
* AE editor documentation almost done by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1379
* WIP AO editor documentation by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1380
* Working API FG1 support (relive only) by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1381
* fix api build by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1382
* Small refactoring and de-duplication of code by @gapys-krzysztof in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1383
* fix #1386 by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1387
* Api and engine updates to allow changing hard coded path data by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1388
* Allow setting hintfly/lcd msg per path, fix big lvl loading OG bug by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1389
* fix Input_GetButtonString_44F1C0 breaking ABI by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1390
* try to fix api + add a smoke test to the build by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1391
* fix null path data when loading a new path by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1392
* Use editor data in status board by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1393
* set mud counts per path rather than per lvl by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1394
* Fix path handling by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1395
* validate zulag array is in bounds, stop incorrect out of bounds log spam by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1396
* Add a better test to fix a lvl writing corruption bug + fix the bug by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1397
* Encapsulate a couple of AE::BaseGameObject fields by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1398
* add latency_hack option that defaults to true to reduce cpu usage by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1399
* add helper func for inlined code, add brain sub state enums for crawling slig and fix scrabs falling through the floor by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1400
* fix wrong bullet offset by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1401
* Add more AO AnimId's by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1402
* add/rename AO AnimId's + background animation AnimId madness by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1403
* Add a bunch of AO AnimId's and use anim records for AO well and AE/AO background animation by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1404
* fix missing bg anim's crashing AO and add a couple more AnimId's by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1405
* fix bad assert on sZulagNumber_5C1A20 by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1406
* Create structs and enums for BgAnimId and fix AE missing anim crash by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1407
* fix AE build errors when dev mode is enabled and fix AO crashing when the well bg anim id is set to 0 by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1408
* Add more AnimId's, use SoundEffect enum for all SFX_PLAY functions, split AE and AO resource id's into two seperate enums by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1409
* add correct elum AnimId data, add MenuHighlight AnimId's, fix swapped MenuHighlight names, name resource id's by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1410
* keep the order properties got added to the json so it not "random" order by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1411
* AO editor documentation + renames by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1412
* Add more AO editor documentation + MeatSaw flags and renames by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1413
* normalize switch id names, editor documentation, rename IdSplitter to TimerTrigger to match AE naming by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1414
* fix 32 <> 64bit interop issue. Include the structure size from here on by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1415
* Only try to load one kind of rope by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1416
* fix de-ref/write to deleted Claw object by making only the SecurityCl… by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1418
* fix a valgrind warning, add the last AO AnimId's and rename some things by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1419
* don't exit(-32) if a lvl is missing in AO by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1420
* fix wrong bans for certain anims by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1421
* replace some placeholder bans with the actual bans by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1422
* wip auto test by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1423
* fix assert + refactor by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1424
* validate the state of objects per frame on record/playback by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1425
* impl record/playback in AO by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1426
* improve logging when game fails to launch by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1427
* try to auto display back trace on linux/osx by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1428
* fix out of bounds array write by @paulsapps in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1429
* fix wrong ban names, name some fields & brain sub states by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1430
* rename Led to LCDScreen to fix qt editor json loading by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1431
* fix crash when custom LCD Screen messages were added by @mouzedrift in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1432

## New Contributors
* @gapys-krzysztof made their first contribution in https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/pull/1383

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing/compare/appveyor_4227...appveyor_1.0.4360

## Installation
To use relive simply download the "RELIVE_Binaries_Lite_Debug" zip for either 32bit (x86) or 64bit (x64) and extract SDL2.dll and relive.exe to your respective game's folder.

name: relive appyveor build 4227
body: You only need to download the "binaries" zip for either 32bit (x86) or 64bit (x64).
